externalDocs.description:
# Title
Experience Case API

# API Overview

Description: Experience Case API allows to 
-  Create and Retrieve Case Notes
-  Create and Retrieve Case Tasks
-  Retrieve and Update Case Authorizations
-  Retrieve Case Documents.
-  Retrieve Cases Summary by Client Id

# Security
** Client Id enforcement ** -> client_id and client_secret should be passed as part of headers

** X-Forwarded-For ** -> The originating IP address of a client hould be passes as part of headers "X-Forwarded-For".

# Resources

      GET   /v1/healthcheck
      GET   /v1/cases
      GET   /v1/cases/{caseId}/notes
      POST  /v1/cases/{caseId}/notes
      GET   /v1/cases/{caseId}/tasks
      POST  /v1/cases/{caseId}/tasks
      GET   /v1/cases/{caseId}/authorizations
      PATCH /v1/cases/{caseId}/authorizations/{authorizationId}
      GET   /v1/cases/{caseId}/documents
# Notes

** Correlation Id enforcement ** -> X-Correlation-ID should be passed as part of headers

All GET Endpoints support Pagination, by passing below query params

```sh
offset:
  description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query
  type: integer
  required: false
  example: 20
  default: 0
limit:
  description: Limit the number of elements on the response
  type: integer
  required: false
  example: 80
  default: 10
```      

# Status Codes

- All GET endpoints return below HTTP Status Codes:

```sh
200 - Success
401 - Access Denied
403 - Forbidden
404 - Not Found
405 - Method not allowed
500 - Internal Server Error
```

- All PATCH endpoints return below HTTP Status Codes:
```sh
200 - Success
400 - Bad Request
401 - Access Denied
403 - Forbidden
405 - Method not allowed
500 - Internal Server Error
```
- All POST endpoints return below HTTP Status Codes:
```sh
202 - Accepted
400 - Bad Request
401 - Access Denied
403 - Forbidden
405 - Method not allowed
500 - Internal Server Error
```

# Examples

    GET   /v1/healthcheck
    Description: Get Status of the API.

```sh
    Response:
{
  "message" : "Success"
}
```

    GET   /v1/cases/{caseId}/notes
    Description: Get ALL Notes for a Case

```sh
    Request:
      - uri params: 
        - caseId: 1234
      - query params:
        - requestedDateTime:
          - required: false
          - type: dateTime
          - format: rfc3339
        - offset:
          - description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query
          - required: false
          - type: integer
        - limit:
          - description: Limit the number of elements on the response
          - required: false
          - type: integer
```

[

    POST   /v1/cases/{caseId}/notes
    Description: Create a Note to a Case
```sh
    Request:
      - uri params: 
        - caseId: 1234
      - body:
        - {
            "uuid": "a25f5974-e7df-43be-b048-23f55e29c971",
            "type": "Note",
            "note": "Lorem ipsum"
          }  
```
```sh
    Response:
```
    GET   /v1/cases/{caseId}/tasks
    Description: Get ALL tasks for a Case

```sh
    Request:
      - uri params: 
        - caseId: 1234
      - query params:

          - required: false
          - type: dateTime
          - format: rfc3339
        - offset:
          - description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query
          - required: false
          - type: integer
        - limit:
          - description: Limit the number of elements on the response
          - required: false
          - type: integer
```

    POST   /v1/cases/{caseId}/tasks
    Description: Create a task to a Case
```sh
    Request:

        - caseId: 1234

            "uuid": "a25f5974-e7df-43be-b048-23f55e29c971",
            "type": "NNNNNNN",
            "priority": "High",
            "startDate": "2020-06-01"
          }  
```
```sh

```

    POST   /v1/cases/{caseId}/authorizations/{authorizationId}
    Description: Update an authorization on a Case
```sh
    Request:
      - uri params: 
        - caseId: 1234
        - authorizationId: 123456
      - body:
        - {
            "authorizationId": 1234,
            "comments": "",
            "status": "Pending"
          } 
```
```sh
    Response:
```
    GET   /v1/cases
    Description: Get Case Summary by Client Id

```sh
    Request:
      - query params:
        - clientId:
          - required: true
          - type: integer
        - requestedDateTime:
          - required: false
          - type: dateTime
          - format: rfc3339
        - offset:
          - description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query
          - required: false
          - type: integer
        - limit:
          - description: Limit the number of elements on the response
          - required: false
          - type: integer
```

get.description: Common method used across all the API's, returns health of API. Return Status 200 and success if the APi is Running and accepting requests.

parameters.name: offset
parameters.description: Skip over a number of elements by specifying an offset value for the query

parameters.name: limit
parameters.description: Limit the number of elements on the response

parameters.name: client_id
parameters.description: The Client ID allocated by MuleSoft when you request access.

parameters.name: client_secret
parameters.description: The Client Secret allocated by MuleSoft when you request access.

parameters.name: X-Forwarded-For
parameters.description: This is the originating IP address of a client.

parameters.name: X-Correlation-ID
parameters.description: This is a UUID or GUID used for the tracking and filtering of requests.

parameters.name: caseId
parameters.description: Search by CaseId.
